Author: molotov-cocktail
Text: i have thyroid issues and i had some of those symptoms when i was diagnosed, initallly w hyperthyroidism, which shifted into hypothyroidism and now i take hormone replacement meds everyday   it basically just means you need to get regular blood tests to see how your hormone levels are faring and act - medicate etc - accordingly   biggest change for me is i have to wait an hour after taking my tablet in the mornings before i can have food - which works pretty well for me - or caffeine - which, admittedly, i fudge sometimes   feel free to pm we w any questions or if you just wanna have a chat :)

Author: flortotheno
Text: I've gotten my blood taken out after my lowest point with ana. Surprisingly everything came out alright but thyroid. Then they proceeded with a thyroid check, I'd say get one but idk If you have to have a blood analysis first
